name: FreeStyle Classic
description: FreeStyle Classic—it’s a cultural icon reborn on-chain. From street courts to global esports, FreeStyle has always been more than basketball; it’s a lifestyle, a language, and a community. Now, we’re evolving that legacy into Web3: where culture, memes, and competition collide, and every player becomes a co-owner of the movement. We’re building a living IP universe, powered not by mechanics but by the people who remix, meme, and represent FreeStyle in their own way. It’s urban energy, digital-native creativity, and community-driven ownership—all fused into one cultural ecosystem.
